subject: How to test a single method???
msgSnippet: Hi All, Assuming my Junit suite has 10 methods to be executed. If I wish to execute only one single method out of the 10 methods, how do I do it through Junit
messageBody:
Hi All,

Assuming my Junit suite has 10 methods to be executed.

If I wish to execute only one single method out of the 10 methods, how do I do it through Junit without changing the Junit stub?

Regards
Deepa Nadig
